requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K/AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti/AMD Radeon R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: *"FPS (frame rate/second): Stable over 30" is guaranteed. *Frame rate may drop when other applications are running in the background.*Please note that minimum and recommended specifications are subjected to changes without notice.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K/AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070/AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: *"FPS (frame rate/second): Stable over 60" is guaranteed. *Frame rate may drop when other applications are running in the background.*Please note that minimum and recommended specifications are subjected to changes without notice.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Used the general requirements for the Unity-Editor. Since that should be generously sufficient.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Intel or AMD/ 64 bit/ 4 Core/ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 16 SM(Streaming Multi Processor)/ 2.0 GHz/ 4 GB/ Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is optimized for displays with a resolution of 1920x1080.
